page.title: 08Shops-Llanhari area
page.content: There are four main shopping centres in the area surveyed,in Talbot Green, Pontyclun,Llanhari and Llanharan.Most of the shops in Talbot Green are located in Talbot Road.They include newsagents, food shops and shops selling clothes and household goods. The shops in Pontyclun are located in Cowbridge road.The types of shops found here are similar to those found in Talbot Green but there are also a number of hairdressers,a chip shop and other take away food shops.The shops in Llanhari are mainly food shops but there is also a hairdressers a chip shop and a chemist.In Llanharan most of the shops are located in Bridgend road,which also has a number of empty shops.They include food shops,clothes shops,an ironmonger and a pet shop.
